segments.text: I see the woman standing there, totally absorbed in her task of drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense that she seems completely unaware of the water spilling all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cheerful garden outside is in sharp contrast with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of anxiety seeing the puddle grow larger at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are quietly plotting their cookie heist, which adds to my unease.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really reaching for that cookie, standing way too high on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just take a moment to look around her, to see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
